title: Structured Chaos
description: The Outsiders meets One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest-Set in Oklahoma in the mid 1990s, Structured Chaos, sequel to Pewter, Murder, and Loaded Dice, finds teen narrator Devin Predire and his cohorts in the throes of their budding booze and drug trafficking enterprise, placing them at odds with the underbelly of their small town's power brokers: corrupt police, attorneys, and social elite. Devin must reconcile stark, bleak reality with a bludgeoning psychogenic fugue before his friends venture further down their path of brutal self-evaluation ending in death and destruction.
author: Nick Sconce
